notes: This map provides an overview of satellite detected waters in Hai Phong Province, northern Vietnam. Due to continuous rainfall, a notable increase in inundated areas occurred within this area. Using satellite imagery acquired 02 August 2015 and 05 October 2009, UNITAR - UNOSAT identified numerous regions with flood affected land in the analyzed extent. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR - UNOSAT.
